form.label: NMON - MEM, AIX Free Memory and Paging space activity

search.query: | tstats count AS Count from datamodel=NMON_Data_MEM where (nodename = MEM) ($osfilter$) groupby "MEM.frameID" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS Count by "MEM.frameID" | sort limit=0 "MEM.frameID" | fields - _span | fillnull Count | fields "MEM.frameID"

| tstats count AS Count from datamodel=NMON_Data_MEM where (nodename = MEM) (MEM.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($osfilter$) groupby "MEM.hostname" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS Count by "MEM.hostname" | sort limit=0 "MEM.hostname" | fields - _span | fillnull Count | fields "MEM.hostname"

| tstats max("MEM.allOS_Real_Free_PCT") AS allOS_Real_Free_PCT max("MEM.allOS_Real_total_MB") AS allOS_Real_total_MB max("MEM.allOS_Real_used_MB") AS allOS_Real_used_MB max("MEM.allOS_Real_used_PCT") AS allOS_Real_used_PCT max("MEM.allOS_Virtual_free_PCT") AS allOS_Virtual_free_PCT max("MEM.allOS_Virtual_total_MB") AS allOS_Virtual_total_MB max("MEM.allOS_Virtual_used_MB") AS allOS_Virtual_used_MB max("MEM.allOS_Virtual_used_PCT") AS allOS_Virtual_used_PCT from datamodel=NMON_Data_MEM where (nodename = MEM) ($osfilter$) (MEM.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($hostname$) ($frameID$) `$timefilter$(MEM)` groupby _time, "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" prestats=true span=1s | bucket _time span=1s | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("MEM.allOS_Real_Free_PCT") AS allOS_Real_Free_PCT max("MEM.allOS_Real_total_MB") AS allOS_Real_total_MB max("MEM.allOS_Real_used_MB") AS allOS_Real_used_MB max("MEM.allOS_Real_used_PCT") AS allOS_Real_used_PCT max("MEM.allOS_Virtual_free_PCT") AS allOS_Virtual_free_PCT max("MEM.allOS_Virtual_total_MB") AS allOS_Virtual_total_MB max("MEM.allOS_Virtual_used_MB") AS allOS_Virtual_used_MB max("MEM.allOS_Virtual_used_PCT") AS allOS_Virtual_used_PCT by _time, "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" | stats dedup_splitvals=t $statsmode$("allOS_Real_Free_PCT") AS Real_Free_PCT $statsmode$("allOS_Real_total_MB") AS Real_total_MB $statsmode$("allOS_Real_used_MB") AS Real_used_MB $statsmode$("allOS_Real_used_PCT") AS Real_used_PCT $statsmode$("allOS_Virtual_free_PCT") AS Virtual_free_PCT $statsmode$("allOS_Virtual_total_MB") AS Virtual_total_MB $statsmode$("allOS_Virtual_used_MB") AS Virtual_used_MB $statsmode$("allOS_Virtual_used_PCT") AS Virtual_used_PCT by "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" | rename "MEM.frameID" AS "frameID" "MEM.hostname" AS hostname | foreach *_MB [eval <<FIELD>>=round(<<FIELD>>, 0)] | foreach *_PCT [eval <<FIELD>>=round(<<FIELD>>, 2)]

| tstats max("MEM.allOS_Real_Free_PCT") AS allOS_Real_Free_PCT max("MEM.allOS_Real_total_MB") AS allOS_Real_total_MB max("MEM.allOS_Real_used_MB") AS allOS_Real_used_MB max("MEM.allOS_Real_used_PCT") AS allOS_Real_used_PCT from datamodel=NMON_Data_MEM where (nodename = MEM) ($osfilter$) (MEM.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($hostname$) ($frameID$) groupby _time, "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" prestats=true span=1s | bucket _time span=1s | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("MEM.allOS_Real_Free_PCT") AS allOS_Real_Free_PCT max("MEM.allOS_Real_total_MB") AS allOS_Real_total_MB max("MEM.allOS_Real_used_MB") AS allOS_Real_used_MB max("MEM.allOS_Real_used_PCT") AS allOS_Real_used_PCT by _time, "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEM,earliest=$timerange.earliest$,latest=$timerange.latest$)` useother=f limit=0 dedup_splitvals=t $statsmode$("allOS_Real_Free_PCT") AS Real_Free_PCT $statsmode$("allOS_Real_total_MB") AS Real_total_MB $statsmode$("allOS_Real_used_MB") AS Real_used_MB $statsmode$("allOS_Real_used_PCT") AS Real_used_PCT by "MEM.hostname" | $charting$ | $memmode$

| tstats max("MEM.allOS_Virtual_free_PCT") AS allOS_Virtual_free_PCT max("MEM.allOS_Virtual_total_MB") AS allOS_Virtual_total_MB max("MEM.allOS_Virtual_used_MB") AS allOS_Virtual_used_MB max("MEM.allOS_Virtual_used_PCT") AS allOS_Virtual_used_PCT from datamodel=NMON_Data_MEM where (nodename = MEM) ($osfilter$) (MEM.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($hostname$) ($frameID$) groupby _time, "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" prestats=true span=1s | bucket _time span=1s | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("MEM.allOS_Virtual_free_PCT") AS allOS_Virtual_free_PCT max("MEM.allOS_Virtual_total_MB") AS allOS_Virtual_total_MB max("MEM.allOS_Virtual_used_MB") AS allOS_Virtual_used_MB max("MEM.allOS_Virtual_used_PCT") AS allOS_Virtual_used_PCT by _time, "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEM,earliest=$timerange.earliest$,latest=$timerange.latest$)` useother=f limit=0 dedup_splitvals=t $statsmode$("allOS_Virtual_free_PCT") AS Virtual_free_PCT $statsmode$("allOS_Virtual_total_MB") AS Virtual_total_MB $statsmode$("allOS_Virtual_used_MB") AS Virtual_used_MB $statsmode$("allOS_Virtual_used_PCT") AS Virtual_used_PCT by "MEM.hostname" | $charting$ | $memmode$
